attributes.action: If Boris Johnson becomes prime minister an immediate general election is called.
attributes.background: It is clear that the Brexit campaign lied to the electorate. Thus once again the British electorate were deceived whilst 48% rejected their proposals, it is clear that a significant proportion of the 52% did. So now the truth is out we should have the opportunity to elect a new government.

rejection.details: Since this petition was started, Mr Johnson has withdrawn his candidacy for leadership of the Conservative Party.
